```{r}
p_load(ggperiodic, StatsBombR, SBpitch, soccermatics)

comps <- FreeCompetitions()

wwc <- comps %>% 
  filter(competition_id == 72, season_id == 30) %>% 
  FreeMatches()

wwc_raw <-  StatsBombFreeEvents(MatchesDF = wwc) %>% 
  allclean() %>% 
  clean_names()

uswnt <- wwc_raw %>% 
  filter(team_name == "United States Women's")
```
